item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 2:40 AM UTC
item.description:

23. MNT Reform Next (120 points | 40 comments)

26. Apple Watch Series 10 (162 points | 338 comments)

28. 300μs typo detection for 1.3M words (60 points | 11 comments)
